column1: 83039729$Grandmaster of the Six Samurai$$EARTH$[Warrior/effect]$$$$$5$2100$800$$$$You can only control 1 "Grandmaster of the Six Samurai". If you control a "Six Samurai" monster
column2: you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card in your possession is destroyed by an opponent's card effect: Target 1 "Six Samurai" monster in your GY; add that target to your hand.$$$$$
